name: KaleïdoChurchProjoVisualsᵀᴹ🟩
description:
PRE NFT Record logs...

21-01-‎19
Creating this glowing kaleidoscopic animation setup to render different loops for the projection mapping event on the historic churn in the old city of Belœil. 2019 version of the annual event SHOW/FRETTE. In collaboration with Dr_Jerkill, Transquébec Audiovisuel and the municipality of Belœil.

13-05-19
Releasing this 16:9 4K video based on this on VJLoops.com
https://www.vjloops.com/stock-video/abstract-kaleidoscopic-glow-patterns-06-140684.html

25-10-21
Minting this 1:1 | 800x800 | 360 frames | 0.06 second per frame
Unexpectedly finding this after thinking it was lost forever. 


Will swap when this tweet gets more than 100 likes
https://twitter.com/xponential/status/1452577573540712452
When the conditions are met, swapping will occur.

Burning ceremony will occur on 1/2 day after the initial swap.
